forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 16 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 12 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As the day drifts into its early evening hours, Downtown San Francisco bathes in the soft embrace of a lingering warmth, with the sun casting its last golden rays before retreating behind a veil of clouds. Currently, the air is crisp and invigorating, with temperatures gently nudging around the mid-sixties, a refreshing contrast to the summer's afternoon blaze. The winds offer a friendly caress, rustling leaves and carrying the scent of sea salt from the nearby bay, a reminder of the ocean's presence even as the shore dips into the horizon.

Looking ahead, the evening will usher in a predominantly cloudy canvass, the sky evolving into shades of gray and dimming light. While temperatures will softly descend to the low fifties, the wind's playful dance at 12 to 22 miles per hour will keep the crispness alive. Those heading out should embrace lightweight layers—a cozy sweater or light jacket will serve well against the cool breeze. Opt for comfortable walks through the city’s lively streets or a gentle stroll by the waterfront, where one could enjoy a moment of reflection as the city transitions from day to night, soaking in the rich tapestry of lights beginning to twinkle. Such an evening speaks to the unpretentious allure of San Francisco, inviting you to explore its understated marvels.
